podcasts

Conversations with real world quantitative hedge fund managers, traders, and experts in the fields of data-driven investing and trading. Podcast hosted by Raghu Kumar.

  • Focused on helping retail traders/investors make better decisions

  • Conversations with experts around the world

  • Easily consumed content (especially with a hot cup of coffee!)

About the host

raghu kumar

Co-Founder

Co-founder and head of Business Development at RAIN, an AI-powered hedge fund based in India. Previously founded Upstox. As a co-founder of multiple successful venture-backed fintech companies, I’ve had the privilege of working closely with some of the world’s most brilliant minds in finance, technology & product.
